string.text: You're an idiot, Marked One. Totally useless! Don't expect gratitude - there's nothing to thank you for!
A pretty good job you did there, Stalker, shooting those mutants. Nothing spectacular, however, so if you want to go through, you'll have to pay.
Excellent, Marked One. You really helped us out there. I say that's payment enough for your pass. Go on to the Bar.
Everybody take your stand. Let them come close. They will be easier targets.
You're on Duty territory, Stalker. Fighting is not tolerated here.
Attention, everyone! This is Duty outpost at the Garbage. A horde of mutants is advancing from the Dark Valley towards the Bar. Whoever helps us push back the scum won't regret it. Duty's word.
Stalker, you're on Duty territory. Any attempt to attack our people will be severely punished.
Great job, boys, we wiped them out. Everybody have some rest. And you, Stalker, come over here. Let's have a chat.

People, this is the commander of the neutral squad. We've kicked the bandits out of the derelict machinery scrapyard. Expecting counterattack. We're low on numbers, so everyone's welcome to give us a helping hand.
